item.title: Terraform Module UX
item.description: UX Is Everyone’s Responsibility Nearly every job posting I’ve ever seen about UX is UI focused, yet the skills are needed everywhere. UX is often thought about as a vehicle for user acquisition and retention: Better UX => More Users Whilst true, this is short-sighted. We’re going to use Terraform module design to show how UX principles are crucial everywhere. Why Terraform Modules? In my day job at Contino, one thing we’re known for are Cloud Landing Zones, with the chief aim of expediting their digital transformation and cloud adoption journey.
